INSERT INTO S_CLI_SEERECORD_CDC (BASE_ID, HOSP_ID, HOSP_NAME, BATCH_NO, AUTO_ID, PATIENT_ID, OUTP_ID, OUTP_NO, `NAME`, CLI_DEPT_CODE, CLI_DEPT_NAME, CLI_DTIME, CLI_DOCT_CODE, CLI_DOCT_NAME, DIAG_CODE, DIAG_NAME, CHIEF_COMPLIANT, SYMPTOM_CODE, SYMPTOM_NAME, MEDICAL_HISTORY, ALLERGIC_HISTORY, CHECK_UP, TREATMENT_PLAN, SBP, DBP, HEIGHT, WEIGHT, CONSULT_QUESTION, HEALTH_REQUEST, HEALTH_EVALUATION, OTHER_MEDICAL_TREATMENT, DIAG_CODING_TYPE, DIAG_NOTE, REFERRAL_FLAG, REFERRAL_NOTE, `TYPE`, `RESULT`, CREATE_DTIME, UPDATE_DTIME, RECORD_DTIME, RECORD_UPDATE_DTIME, HOSP_ID_BAK, HOSP_NAME_BAK, OLD_CLI_DEPT_CODE, OLD_CLI_DEPT_NAME, OLD_MEDICAL_TPYE_CODE, OLD_MEDICAL_TPYE_NAME, TEMP, CLINIC_END_TIME) SELECT BASE_ID, '73427532', '宁波市北仑区第三人民医院', BATCH_NO, AUTO_ID, PATIENT_ID, OUTP_ID, OUTP_NO, `NAME`, CLI_DEPT_CODE, CLI_DEPT_NAME, TO_DATE(CLI_DTIME), CLI_DOCT_CODE, CLI_DOCT_NAME, DIAG_CODE, DIAG_NAME, CHIEF_COMPLIANT, SYMPTOM_CODE, SYMPTOM_NAME, MEDICAL_HISTORY, ALLERGIC_HISTORY, CHECK_UP, TREATMENT_PLAN, SBP, DBP, HEIGHT, WEIGHT, CONSULT_QUESTION, HEALTH_REQUEST, HEALTH_EVALUATION, OTHER_MEDICAL_TREATMENT, DIAG_CODING_TYPE, DIAG_NOTE, REFERRAL_FLAG, REFERRAL_NOTE, `TYPE`, `RESULT`, TO_DATE(CREATE_DTIME), TO_DATE(UPDATE_DTIME), TO_DATE(RECORD_DTIME), TO_DATE(RECORD_UPDATE_DTIME), HOSP_ID_BAK, HOSP_NAME_BAK, OLD_CLI_DEPT_CODE, OLD_CLI_DEPT_NAME, OLD_MEDICAL_TPYE_CODE, OLD_MEDICAL_TPYE_NAME, TEMP, TO_DATE(CLINIC_END_TIME) FROM S_CLI_SEERECORD

insert into E12010000_CDC (ORG_CODE, CLINIC_ID, `NO`, DEPT_CODE, REGISTER_ID, CARDID, EMP_ID, PAT_NO, PERSONID, `NAME`, SEX, BIRTHDAY, AGE, AGE2, CF_TYPE, IDCARD, CARDNUM, CLINIC_TIME, IF_FIRSTVISIT, TCM_DIEASE_CODE, TCM_DIEASE_NAME, TCM_SYNDROME_CODE, TCM_SYNDROME_NAME, THERAPEUTIC_METHOD_CODE, THERAPEUTIC_METHOD, AUTO_ID, HOSP_NAME, HOSP_ID, PATIENT_ID, LK_CLI_REG, CREATE_DTIME, UPDATE_DTIME, RECORD_DTIME, RECORD_UPDATE_DTIME, CASE_TYPE FROM E12010000
